title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 May 2008 - XWiki
content: xwikibot - (06/05/2008 00:10): Project Xcards.WebHome was modified by  - http://www.chronopolys.org/xwiki/bin/view/Project+Xcards/ vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:10): sdumitriu: pong vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:10): just arrived in SF sdumitriu - (06/05/2008 00:11): Hi sdumitriu - (06/05/2008 00:11): I was wondering what's with the new logging component vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:11): you mean how to use it? sdumitriu - (06/05/2008 00:12): Why do we need something like that, isn't CommonLogging + Log4J enough? sdumitriu - (06/05/2008 00:12): And yes, how to use it vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:12): it's even better than commons logging/etc vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:12): since it's fully independent of any implementation vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:12): to use it: vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:12): extends AbstractLogEnabled sdumitriu - (06/05/2008 00:13): And to customize it? vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:13): (or implements LogEnabled) sdumitriu - (06/05/2008 00:13): Like choose the logging level vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:14): I haven't done it but probably something like this: http://plexus.codehaus.org/writing-components-trail/05\_01\_custom\_logging\_implementation.html vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:15): (you should be able to put this in the plexus.xml file) vmassol\_ - (06/05/2008 00:34): news xwikibot - (06/05/2008 00:34): Last 5 pages modified: xwikibot - (06/05/2008 00:34):   \* IRC.xwikiArchive20080506 - (06/05/2008 11:15): now if i follo the link i get an error 500 maggo - (06/05/2008 11:17): my log says error on parsing hte hibernate.cfg.xml file (119) The content of element type "session-factory" must match ... maggo - (06/05/2008 11:17): any ideas what went wrong? xwikibot - (06/05/2008 11:30): Main.anitaPage was modified by XWiki.anita - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/anitaPage jvelociter - (06/05/2008 11:51): maggo: hi jvelociter - (06/05/2008 11:51): what XWiki version you installed ? maggo - (06/05/2008 11:53): jvelociter: 1.2.6932, thx to but now it works i used a working hibernat file from my xwiki farm xwikibot - (06/05/2008 11:53): Main.anitaPage was modified by  - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/anitaPage jvelociter - (06/05/2008 11:53): maggo: ok :) maggo - (06/05/2008 12:08): sorry next question, what do i need if on the page createing new wiki i gets this (v$wikidocument.display("description", "edit") instead of filds? sdumitriu - (06/05/2008 13:40): Not the xar, the plugin (jar) thomasmortagne - (06/05/2008 13:43): maggo : what did you installed exactly ? when you say "i will install xwiki" you mean XWiki Enterprise Manager ? jvelociter - (06/05/2008 13:48): maggo: if you install the xar, you will need wikimanager and application manager jars plugins maggo - (06/05/2008 13:50): jvelciter: i installed xwiki enterprise manager and the xar files, the jar not i think, let's look jvelociter - (06/05/2008 13:54): Plugins/ in code.xwiki.org maggo - (06/05/2008 13:59): jvelociter: installed xars are: application-application-manager1.2, enterprise-manager-application-xem.1.2-milestone-2, enterprise-manager-wiki-administrator1.2 enterprise-wiki.1.2 maggo -
